title: REWORK DOESNT WORK !
body: i am in the middle of game (right now) that has AFK jungler since first minute... and game doesn't do rework PLS HELP !

replies.body:
guy reconnected at minute 19:29 and asked (while enemy was in our base) WHY WE FED SO MUCH. 
Riot you need to work on your "rework" system bug (btw... game doesn't even recognize command /rework) 
If four players tag a teammate for being AFK, (in first 5 to 10 minutes of the game) after game didn't recognize original akf, GAME SHOULD STOP.

> btw... game doesn't even recognize command /rework

This might be the reason it wasn't working, the command is /remake not /rework.

Also you may not have met all the remake conditions, which you can double check on the [**Remake FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686).

>-  /Remake becomes available at 3:00 if a player is disconnected or flagged as inactive for 90 seconds. First blood against a player's team before they leave/dc will prevent a /remake vote.
> - At 3:00, the impacted team has 60 seconds to start a vote by typing /remake in chat. Once the vote begins, you have 30 seconds to vote yes or no.
> - In a 4v5, at least two players (30% of the team) need to vote yes for the game to end. In a 3v5 or lower, you only need one player to make that call.
> - Once the vote passes, the game ends. You'll neither gain nor lose LP/BE/XP, and you won't see a win or loss on your record. The inactive players (and Diamond V and above players in their premade) are punished.

http://prntscr.com/hflsze <- this is a match history of that AFK player. 
Now how am I supposed to advance in this game? I win 30 games in a row with very few defeats ... and yet this is the reason for defeat?
